item.title: Using WireGuard on Linux
item.description: WireGuard is a point-to-point encryption network. I have been using it to manage/connect all my cloud servers. Today, let’s share how to use WireGuard! Install WireGuard Basically, the WireGuard Install Page provides complete installation methods and commands for various versions, so you can refer to it directly. Create WireGuard Profile First, go to the WireGuard installation folder. If it does not exist, please create it. cd /etc/wireguard Use the command to generate a public and private key, and use “cat” to view the contents of the public and private keys.
